other_tests.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour. There is a focal heterogeneously hypoechoic lesion in the right lobe measuring 1.5 x 1.6 x 1.4 cm, possibly indicating focal fatty sparing. The common hepatic duct measures 6 mm with no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The gallbladder is nondistended and contains small stones at the fundus. No pericholecystic fluid is noted. The pancreas appears normal without masses or ductal dilation.
